_88ProjectMode.description: The different modes to run the project in.

___SitePath.description: The path to this site's client side files.

___BaseUrl.description:
The base url for the website, can be null unless the site is hosted in a subfolder, then you
should set this to the subfolder path.

$eref.description: The different modes to run the project in.

___ProjectMode.description: The mode to handle the project's files.

___EdityCorePath.description: The path to the edity core client side files.

___OutputPath.description: The output folder for published files.

___ReadFromCurrentDirectory.description: True to read only from the current directory.

___OverrideVars.description:
The override variables for the project. These variables take ultimate precidence over all other
variables defined in edity.json files. Mostly useful to override variables when working on the code.
Defaults to null, which means no overrides.
